content: i learned to make this coaster while volunteering as a victorian lady at living history farms one summer crocheting was a proper pastime for ladies so it was something i was allowed to do while in costume i have seen many adaptions to make these bigger and use them as potholders or hotpads i love using them as coasters in the summer because they soak up the condensation from drinking glasses nicely one skein of lily s sugar n cream cotton yarn can make 2 coasters with some yarn left over a small coaster size starts with a chain of 25 the medium size for a coffee mug starts with a chain of 28 enjoy d
